error.message: Подключение не установлено, т.к. конечный компьютер отверг запрос на подключение [::1]:2247
error.detail:
System.ServiceModel.EndpointNotFoundException: There was no endpoint listening at http://localhost:2247/UserService/Storage.svc that could accept the message. This is often caused by an incorrect address or SOAP action. See InnerException, if present, for more details. ---> System.Net.WebException: Unable to connect to the remote server ---> System.Net.Sockets.SocketException: Подключение не установлено, т.к. конечный компьютер отверг запрос на подключение [::1]:2247 at System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DoConnect(EndPoint endPointSnapshot, SocketAddress socketAddress) at System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectSocketInternal(Boolean connectFailure, Socket s4, Socket s6, Socket& socket, IPAddress& address, ConnectSocketState state, IAsyncResult asyncResult, Exception& exception) --- End of inner exception stack trace --- at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream(TransportContext& context) at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream() at System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpOutput.WebRequestHttpOutput.GetOutputStream() --- End of inner exception stack trace ---
